name: Washed Up! (itch)
description:
Blocks are washing up on the beaches of your pristine atoll. Deploy your crab helpers to pick them up and arrange them into squares to score points!

A different take on the puzzle-block-arranging genre that requires you to manage two sides at once, while giving you lots more choice of which blocks to place next, but can you think fast enough?

Features
  • Pentomino arranging fun
  • Risk-reward mechanic: can you extend squares before they fill up for big points?
  • Power-ups: cannons, explosive blocks and time-rewinding ships clocks
  • Special storm rush mode
  • Play with keyboard, game pad or drag/drop using the mouse
Download with Itch.io App!

You should install Washed Up! through the Itch.io app, especially on macOS.

Leaderboards

The free Itch version of this game only has local leaderboards. The Steam version has online leaderboards, friend score chasing, and achievements. You can claim a Steam key only on paid copies of the game.
